tool_description: Get The latest global news from different resources.
name: All News
title: All News

api_list.name: Get All The News From CNN By Category
api_list.description:
Get the latest news from CNN as a resource. 
Available categories : 
- world
- africa
- americas
- asia
- australia
- china
- europe
- india
- middle-east
- uk
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-news.p.rapidapi.com/api/cnn/?news=all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All The News From Fow News By Category
api_list.description:
Get the latest news from Fox News as a resource.

- politics
- media
- opinion
- entertainment
- sports
- lifestyle

api_list.name: Get All The News
